info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Huerfano and southwestern Pueblo Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Pueblo Reservoir, or 17 miles east of Junkins Burn Scar, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
